entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who attempted to kill Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, a young boy who survived Voldemort's attempt on his life.

entities.name: house-elves
entities.description: A group of magical creatures that are bound to serve wizarding families.

entities.name: children
entities.description: Young people who are the subject of Voldemort's disregard for their power and innocence.

relationships.description: Voldemort attempted to kill Harry, but failed.
Voldemort does not value or comprehend the power of house-elves.
Voldemort knows and understands nothing about love, loyalty, and innocence in children.
